actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Automobile Information Disclosure Act in order to broaden the application of such Act to include certain recreational vehicles and vans.

summary.text: Amends the Automobile Information Disclosure Act to require that the information and labels that are required to be affixed to automobiles be affixed to recreational vehicles, or passenger or parcel delivery vans with a gross vehicle weight of 10,000 pounds or less.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Automobile Information Disclosure Act in order to broaden the application of such Act to include certain recreational vehicles and vans.
